author: blair
msg: Fix #3246.  The absolute or relative URLs in the
svn_wc_external_item2_t that are replaced by an absolute URL should be
allocated from a pool that is not cleared upon the handling of each
Add a new non-iterpool to this struct for paths and URLs that
need to outlive any one iteration over any one external item.
Pass the pool and not the iter_pool to resolve_relative_external_url()
so the absolute URL placed into the hash table lives past the

author: blair
msg: Work on #3246.  Paths and URLs allocated in a subpool are outliving
the pool, so prepare to add to the handle_external_item_change_baton
struct the long-lived pool.  Rename the pool field to iter_pool to
make it clear nothing persistent should be used with it.
